page.title: 11Coralhill Farm
page.content: {Coralhill}farm is owned by the{Ross family and covers{269}acres.It is quite a big farm and they have been extending it for a few years now.Their biggest piece of machinery is the {combine harvester}which is used in the month of{September}.The biggest shed is what the Ross family call the new shed as it was built recently. Altogether they have{seven}sheds including the Dutch Barn where all their machinery is kept.Mr Ross owns {30}main pieces of machinery and one grain drier.He also owns{24}fields, Here is a list of what is in each: { barley park,(5) turnips park,(2) { silage park,(6) grass(5) { sheep park,(1) early potatoes,(2) { late potatoes,(1) cattle.(2) The farmhouse itself is quite big,it has ten rooms in use and one spare room.Coralhill farm is doing well.
